examples: the home of the free and the brave

definitions.text: possessing or displaying courage; able to face and deal with danger or fear without flinching; - Herman Melville; - William Wordsworth
examples: Familiarity with danger makes a brave man braver but less daring
a frank courageous heart...triumphed over pain
set a courageous example by leading them safely into and out of enemy-held territory
girls decked out in brave new dresses
a dress a bit too gay for her years
